entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT output for various empty string test methods extremely suboptimal #63201
  • ExecutionEngineException when using step-by-step #63199
  • InvalidProgramException is extremely unhelpful #63198
  • Building a dotnet6 project on the M1 processor is incompatible with x64 architecture, despite using rid=linux-x64 #63197
  • Bug: Change in behavior with .NET 5 vs .NET 6 in AllowMultiple attributes #63195
  • Bug: DateTime.Now from .NET 6 will return UTC time, not local time in Ubuntu #63194
  • .NET 6 R2R does not work with classes with umlauts in referenced assemblies #63193
  • Validate that no important Stream overrides are missing based on a systematic check #63191
  • coreclr.dll 5.0.13 symbols cannot be found #63190
  • hi， how can I run test on windows use Mono runtime with release/6.0 branch #63189
  • Performance of .Net 6 vs .Net Core 2.2 on big html pages #63188
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort not working on linux-musl-arm64 #63187
  • Inconsistent nullability change in TypeConverter.CanConvertTo resulting in a breaking API change with .NET 6.0 #63186
  • FileSystemWatch EnableRaisingEvents not supported on MonoVM #63185
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\StaticVirtualMethods\\NegativeTestCases\\UnimplementedAbstractMethodOnAbstractClass\\UnimplementedAbstractMethodOnAbstractClass.cmd #63180

Closed

  • The System.Text.Encoding.Latin1 encoder fallback should encode the ligature `œ` as `oe` instead of `o` #63192
  • iOS App testing fails from Xcode version mismatch #36536
    7.0.0
  • exception catch clause does work on Linux arm/arm64 for .net 6.0 release #62702

PullRequests

Created

  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    community-contribution
  • avoid ArgumentOutOfRangeException while processing invalid or incomplete TLS frame #63184
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix NativeAOT multifile test run #63183
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Cleanup in NativeAOT from x86 attempt #63182
    community-contribution

Merged

  • [mono] Use Xcode path from xcode-select instead of hardcoding #63076
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix _il suffix for _d/_r-variant ilproj tests #63178
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Updated

  • Encapsulate the logic of caching the last synchronously completed task. #61781
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add CancellationToken to TextReader.ReadXAsync #61898
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.MaxBufferSize seems incorrect #61755
    area-System.Buffers
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message (#62894) #63012
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1529422 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] [debugger] Increase timeout for debugger tests on CI #63173
  • [LoongArch64] Add LoongArch64 support in libunwind. #62979
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove unused private parameters in SPC #63015
    area-System.Runtime
  • More cleanups in assembly loader area #63157
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Switch to objwriter from the dotnet/llvm-project repo #63177
    * NO MERGE *, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Wasm App publish is failing with '--self-contained false --runtime linux-arm' on missing DotNetJsVersion #23202
  • dotnet test - allow to specify msbuild properties #23198
  • Question: Is a M1 Mac required to build Mac-arm64 App? #23195
  • Run .NET Framework project on VS code #23203

Closed

  • With .NET 6.0.2xx, dotnet tool could not list installed tools #22979
    6.0.2xx

PullRequests

Merged

  • Merge 6.0.2xx to main #22966

Updated

  • Warn instead of Error for Windows7 SingleFile #23177
    Area-External

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense, Syntax highlight and Error Window are badly broken with incremental source generator in Visual Studio 17.0.4 #58523
  • System.InvalidCastException when SemanticModel attempts to bind simple program with a local function as the first statement #58521
  • An invalid IL is emitted for a method access through a type constructed with modified (with modopt) type arguments #58520
  • Stack overflow through type forwarder #58517

Closed

  • Confirm expected behavior for DontCreateIndentOperationForBrokenBracketedArgumentList after discard parsing changes #15813
    Compiler.Next
  • Is there an API syntax node that allows developers to get error messages through error messages? #58503

PullRequests

Created

  • MemberSemanticModel - special case binding CompilationUnit for a simple program. #58527
    Area-Compilers
  • HeapOrReferenceIndexBase.Add - immediately reserve the slot to be resilient to a re-entrancy #58526
    Area-Compilers
  • Update language feature status #58525
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify new integration tests using a source generator #58524
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • semi auto properties: Address feedback of previous PR #58519
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable indenter tests #58488
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Optimize custom modifier check in PEFieldSymbol.EnsureSignatureIsLoaded. #58522
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handling defaults provided by IAsyncCompletionDefaultsSource #57685
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58361
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Updated

  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nameof to access instance members. #48754
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Update Public API files #41000
    Area-Compilers, Concept-Null Annotations
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Adjust design behind Nullable analysis for target-typed expressions and add handling for target-typed new. #58509
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, New Language Feature - Target-Typed New
  • Refactor IsAutoPropertyWithGetAccessor usage in MethodCompiler #58515
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • SignatureHelp: guess best overload for incomplete invocations #31843
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor MAUI project support linked file properly #39236
  • Owin key `server.IsLocal` is missing from `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Owin` or docs are out of sync #39235
  • Passing IEnumerable FromBody vs FromQuery #39234
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.DefaultHttpContext)HttpContext). Session #39233
  • HttpClient functionality difference between VS 2019 and VS 2022 #39232
  • VS2022 v17.0.3: Blazor Web Assembly: ASP.NET Core Hosted: .Net 6: Publish: dotnet.timezones.blat: Failed to find a valid digest in the 'integrity' #39231
  • Blazor\Razor components: @layout in component do not work for Html.RenderComponentAsync in cshtml #39230
  • Blazor EditorRequired attribute incorrectly reports RZ2012 warning when @bind-MyVariable= is used instead of MyVariable= syntax. #39229
  • Duplicate Razor Component Page value causes Object reference not set to an instance of an object in _Host.cshtml #39228
  • Consider a nicer API for configuring JsonOptions for minimal actions / route-to-code #39226
  • In ServerPrerendered mode, how to cache Html after Blazor rendering is complete? #39225
  • OnActionExecuted no async in ActionFilterAttribute #39224
  • Blazor Wasm PWA 在非 localhost 下运行访问不到 #39222

Closed

  • Blazor AOT .Net6 Preview 7 - Still downloading Dlls #35302
    Discussions
  • The configuration does not work to avoid circular reference in minimal api #39220
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix #39210
  • Perf regression: mvc #39218

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix LogError argument order in WebAssemblyErrorBoundaryLogger #39223
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • feat (VSCode) : Add tasks to build current project #39221
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Work around dotnet/msbuild#3274 #39146
    area-commandlinetools
  • Faster ParseHeaders #39216
    area-runtime
  • feat (FeatureCollection): Add `IFeatureCollection.GetRequiredFeature` extension method #39192
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add MIT License Headers to `Components/Web.JS/**/*.ts` Files #39164
    area-blazor
  • Use NullabilityInfoContext in DataAnnotationsMetadataProvider #39219
    area-mvc
  • Set asp-append-version to true for everything #39209
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell FlyoutHeader at the wrong position in WinUI #3879
  • Cannot use StaticResources for resources in App.xaml #3878
  • [Android, iOS] NavigationPage.TitleView not showing #3877
  • MaUI blazor dektop application can not publish on windows 11 preview 22523 #3876
  • Device.Info.ScaledScreenSize Interface alternatives #3875
  • Unable to run wpf blazor apps via command line in c# #3874

Closed

  • [Bug] Respond to Screen Scaling #977
    6.0.200-preview.13

PullRequests

Created

  • Proposal - Replace internal use of MessagingCenter #3880

Merged

  • [Android] Only set click listener if the item is indeed clickable #1884
    area/a11y, 6.0.200-preview.13

Updated

  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Add CarouselView handlers on Controls [iOS] #3141
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • CarouselView android handler #3343
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Ensure that changing RowSpacing/ColumnSpacing invalidates grid #3873
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Account for spacing when determining available space for star rows/columns #3871
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Remove layout resolution #3818
    6.0.200-preview.13
  • Clip layouts to bounds #3709
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Radiobutton Handler #3784
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates 📄, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.13
  • GridLayout -> Grid to reduce confusion #3865
    proposal/open, area/layout 🔲
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
